properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is something today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There is singing today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There is praising today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There is dancing today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
There is shouting today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
There is praying today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
There is healing today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
There is anointing today
in the house
of the Lord. x3
Hallelujah today in the
house of the Lord!
